Trade/Device Name(s): Copan MSwab Collection, Transport and Preservation System
Regulation Name(s): Microbiological specimen collection and transport devices
Specimen Type(s): Clinical specimens containing Gram positive aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Specimen Container(s): Plastic screw-cap tube with conical shaped bottom
Methodologies: Shell vial culture for viral specimens
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Copan MSwab Collection, Transport and Preservation System for collection and transport of specimens containing Gram positive bacteria and HSV 1/2.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for collection, transport, and preservation of clinical specimens containing Gram positive aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria, HSV 1 and HSV 2 from collection site to laboratory for culture.
